name: 192bc0dc-2c6c-54a4-b737-d17c6b7783c6
notes: This dataset contains the results obtained by an automatic classification using hidden Markov models of a continuous seismic dataset. To avoid long computational times, we reduced the seismic data using pre-processing step. The start and end times of the windows used for the classification are also included in this dataset. Furthermore, an avalanche reference data set is included and the python scripts used to perform the processing steps and the classification.
title: Automatic detection of avalanches
Machine learning approach on seismic data
